tables.name: sei_blocks
tables.description: Cosmos Blockchain Blocks Dataset: This dataset contains information about blocks in the Cosmos ecosystem, providing insights into network activity and block production. It includes data on block height, timestamp, and other key metrics.

columns.name: block_height
columns.description: The height of the block in the blockchain.

columns.name: block_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp at which the block was produced.

columns.name: chain_id
columns.description: The unique identifier of the Cosmos blockchain.

columns.name: proposer_address
columns.description: The address of the validator that proposed the block.

columns.name: validators_hash
columns.description: A hash of the validators involved in the block production process.

columns.name: ingestion_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp at which the block data was ingested into the dataset.

tables.name: sei_event_attributes
tables.description: This table provides information about the attributes associated with events on the Cosmos blockchain ecosystem. It allows for analysis of various event attributes across different blockchains.

columns.name: block_height
columns.description: The height of the block in which the event occurred.

columns.name: chain_id
columns.description: The ID of the Cosmos blockchain on which the event occurred.

columns.name: tx_id
columns.description: The ID of the transaction in which the event occurred.

columns.name: event_index
columns.description: The index of the event within the transaction in which it occurred.

columns.name: event_type
columns.description: The type of event that occurred.

columns.name: event_source
columns.description: The source of the event, indicating the module or contract that triggered it.

columns.name: attribute_key
columns.description: The key of the attribute associated with the event.

columns.name: attribute_value
columns.description: The value of the attribute associated with the event.

columns.name: attribute_index
columns.description: The index of the attribute within the event in which it occurred.

columns.name: ingestion_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp at which the data was ingested into the system.

columns.name: block_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp of the block in which the event occurred.

tables.name: sei_message_event_attributes
tables.description: This table contains various attributes of messages from the Cosmos blockchain ecosystem. It provides information about the attributes associated with specific events on the blockchain.

columns.name: block_height
columns.description: The height of the block in which the event occurred.

columns.name: chain_id
columns.description: The unique identifier of the Cosmos blockchain.

columns.name: tx_id
columns.description: The unique identifier of the transaction.

columns.name: message_index
columns.description: The index of the message in the transaction.

columns.name: event_index
columns.description: The index of the event in the message.

columns.name: event_type
columns.description: The type of event that occurred.

columns.name: attribute_key
columns.description: The key of the attribute associated with the event.

columns.name: attribute_value
columns.description: The value of the attribute associated with the event.

columns.name: attribute_index
columns.description: The index of the attribute in the message.

columns.name: ingestion_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp when the data was ingested into the system.

tables.name: sei_transactions
tables.description: This table contains a comprehensive collection of transaction data from the Cosmos ecosystem, providing insights into the blockchain's activity and behavior.

columns.name: block_height
columns.description: The height of the block within which the transaction was committed.

columns.name: chain_id
columns.description: A unique identifier for the specific Cosmos blockchain network.

columns.name: tx_id
columns.description: A unique identifier for the transaction.

columns.name: tx_info
columns.description: Detailed information about the transaction, including its type and parameters.

columns.name: tx_log_message
columns.description: A human-readable message describing the outcome of the transaction.

columns.name: memo
columns.description: A note or comment left by the sender or receiver of the transaction.

columns.name: fee
columns.description: The amount of coins paid by the sender as a transaction fee.

columns.name: tx_code
columns.description: The return code of the transaction, indicating its success or failure.

columns.name: tx_index
columns.description: The index of the transaction within the block.

columns.name: gas_used
columns.description: The total amount of gas consumed by the transaction.

columns.name: gas_wanted
columns.description: The amount of gas requested by the sender to execute the transaction.

columns.name: ingestion_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp when the transaction was ingested into the blockchain.

columns.name: schema_version
columns.description: The version of the transaction schema used to validate the transaction.

columns.name: fee_coins
columns.description: The coins used to pay the transaction fee.

columns.name: fee_granter
columns.description: The account that granted the funds to pay the transaction fee.

columns.name: fee_payer
columns.description: The account that paid the transaction fee.

columns.name: gas_limit
columns.description: The maximum amount of gas that can be consumed by the transaction.

columns.name: single_sign_mode
columns.description: A flag indicating whether the transaction was executed in single-sign mode.

columns.name: multi_sign_json
columns.description: JSON data containing information about the multi-signature transaction.

columns.name: timeout_height
columns.description: The height of the block at which the transaction will timeout if not executed.

tables.name: sei_tx_messages
tables.description: This table contains transaction messages from various blockchains in the Cosmos ecosystem. It provides insights into the transactions and their associated details.

columns.name: block_height
columns.description: The height of the block in which the transaction was included.

columns.name: chain_id
columns.description: The identifier of the blockchain where the transaction occurred.

columns.name: tx_id
columns.description: A unique identifier for the transaction.

columns.name: tx_index
columns.description: The index of the transaction in the block.

columns.name: message_index
columns.description: The index of the message in the transaction.

columns.name: message_type
columns.description: The type of message sent in the transaction.

columns.name: message
columns.description: The actual message sent in the transaction.

columns.name: schema_version
columns.description: The version of the schema used to store the data.

columns.name: ingestion_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp when the data was ingested into the system.

columns.name: block_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp when the block was created.

tables.name: sei_validators
tables.description: This table tracks information about validators in the Cosmos ecosystem, including their operational details, commission rates, and tokens. It provides valuable insights into the validator landscape and their performance.

columns.name: operator_address
columns.description: Unique address of the validator operator.

columns.name: account_address
columns.description: Unique address of the validator's account.

columns.name: consensus_pubkey
columns.description: Public key used for consensus in the validator's blockchain.

columns.name: jailed
columns.description: Boolean indicating whether the validator is currently jailed.

columns.name: status
columns.description: Current status of the validator, e.g., bonded, unbonded, etc.

columns.name: tokens
columns.description: Number of tokens staked by the validator.

columns.name: moniker
columns.description: Human-readable name of the validator.

columns.name: identity
columns.description: Validator's identity key or public key.

columns.name: website
columns.description: Validator's website or documentation URL.

columns.name: security_contact
columns.description: Validator's security contact email or keybase username.

columns.name: details
columns.description: Additional details about the validator, e.g., their mission, nodes, etc.

columns.name: unbonding_height
columns.description: Height at which the validator's unbonding period begins.

columns.name: unbonding_time
columns.description: Time at which the validator's unbonding period begins.

columns.name: commission_rate
columns.description: Current commission rate of the validator.

columns.name: commission_max_rate
columns.description: Maximum commission rate allowed for the validator.

columns.name: commission_max_change_rate
columns.description: Maximum rate at which the validator's commission rate can change.

columns.name: commission_update_time
columns.description: Time at which the validator's commission rate was last updated.

columns.name: min_self_delegation
columns.description: Minimum self-delegation amount required for the validator.

columns.name: snapshot_height
columns.description: Height at which the validator's snapshot was last taken.

columns.name: snapshot_time
columns.description: Time at which the validator's snapshot was last taken.

columns.name: ingestion_timestamp
columns.description: Timestamp of when the data was ingested from the blockchain.
